data.name: Main_Desc
data.value: OffLogs is a service that allows you to aggregate debugging information (logs) in one place from your services or sites, it is convenient to view it, as well as receive operational statistics on this information. One of the important principles that we adhere to is safety. Therefore, most of the information stored on our servers in encrypted form, and only you have the opportunity to receive and view it in decrypted form.

data.name: Main_HowItWorks_Desc
data.value:
For example. One of the cases where OffLogs can help you:
1. Suppose you have one or more websites. These sites are located on different servers 2. You use one of our clients or create your own logger to send logs to our API. (You can read about using our API [here](/documentation/api/2_1_rest_api)) 3. Your sites or services, in the course of work, will generate debugging information that will be received and encrypted by our service. 4. It's all :) Now you can view all debug information from your resources in [dashboard](/dashboard/main) 5. And if you set up alerts then you will also receive a notification if, for example, one of your resources generated an error

data.name: Main_Features_Desc
data.value: - There is no need to manually monitor debug information from your resources, especially if they are located on different servers - Flexible notification system when receiving certain debugging information - Viewing detailed statistics - Convenient viewing and filtering of logs and debugging information

data.name: Support_Header
data.value:
For issues concerning the software itself, there are several ways to get help on questions about OffLogs.
Please choose from the following:

data.name: Support_Desc_Documentation
data.value: To get additional information on how to integrate and working with OffLogs, our [Wiki](/documentation/common/1_1_common) will help.

data.name: Support_Desc_BugTracking
data.value: If you found any bug please check or add your bug to our [bug tracker](https://gitlab.com/offlogs-public/main/-/issues) for already reported and discussed bugs and feature requests.

data.name: Support_Desc_Email
data.value: If you have any questions please send us an email at **support@offlogs.com**

data.name: User_EmailSuccessfullyVerified
data.value: Your email address has been successfully verified!

data.name: Error_500
data.value: Server error. Please contact to the support :(
